prompt:
Describe a scenario in which you had to make an important decision quickly and how your writing skills helped you make the right choice.
Recently, I found myself facing a challenging situation where I needed to decide between two competing offers for my services as a freelance writer. Both offered attractive compensation packages, but one involved working with a well-known publication while the other allowed me more creative control over the project. Given my limited time and resources, I had to make an important decision quickly.
